CementBrick - Class in com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model
This class is brick of type Cement and the only brick type with strength of 2.
This class is the only brick type that draw cracks on impact for this version.

Class constructor.
Calls the super class constructor and passes in the respective arguments.
The crack is initialised here.
Calls the Brick.brickFace and assigns to CementBrick.brickFace.

changeSpeed() - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.controller.DebugConsole
Defines the action when the "Reset Ball Speed" button in debugPanel is pressed.
